    • OnSubmit

      public void OnSubmit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the submit button is pressed the information entered into the textfields is submitted into the database as a new user. The role is automatically set to customer in order to avoid giving a user access to staff only controls.
      Parameters:
      event - is triggered when the submit button is pressed

    • onHomeButtonClick

      public void onHomeButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      When the home button is pressed then the login page is returned
      Parameters:
      event - is triggered when the return home button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException - in case loading the view fails
